trans-unit.source: Runs a set of child activities according to a single defined ordering.
trans-unit.target: Executa um conjunto de atividades filhas, de acordo com uma única ordem definida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> é um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, o que significa o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> pode conter outras atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> class coordinates the running of a set of child activities in an ordered manner, one at a time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> classe coordena a execução de um conjunto de atividades filho de forma ordenada, um por vez.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> is completed when the final child activity is finished.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> é concluída quando a atividade filho final é concluída.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> should not implement the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener%601> interface, or the derived class will not execute correctly.
trans-unit.target: Classes que derivam de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> não deve implementar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener%601> interface ou classe derivada não serão executados corretamente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> class and add the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> classes to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> classe e adicione o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> classes para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> classe.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the WhileAndParallel SDK Sample from the WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo WhileAndParallel SDK do arquivo WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using While and Parallel](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [usando enquanto e paralelo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> class and add the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> classes to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> classe e adicione o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> classes para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> classe.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the WhileAndParallel SDK Sample from the WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo WhileAndParallel SDK do arquivo WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using While and Parallel](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [usando enquanto e paralelo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84).

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atividade definido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity" /> usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The execution context of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de execução da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the execution of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a execução da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> of the activity after canceling the execution.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> da atividade após o cancelamento da execução.

trans-unit.source: The execution context of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de execução da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Executes the activity.
trans-unit.target: Executa a atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> of the activity after executing the activity.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> da atividade após a execução da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> for this instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> which caused this fault.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> que causou esta falha.

trans-unit.source: Called when an exception is raised within the context of the execution of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma exceção é gerada dentro do contexto da execução desta instância.

trans-unit.source: The execution status of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O status da execução da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> for this instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Called when an activity is removed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma atividade é removida.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> for this instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, determines the action taken by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity" /> when the activity has completed execution.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, determina a ação realizada pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity" /> quando a execução da atividade foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="executionContext" /> is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="executionContext" /> é uma referência nula (Nada no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> for this instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Called after changes have been made to the collection <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities" /> of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Chamado após alterações terem sido feitas à coleção <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities" /> desta instância.

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que gerencie o evento.

trans-unit.source: The previously typed event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos do evento com tipo anterior.

trans-unit.source: Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Define o procedimento de processamento quando o evento subscribed-to ocorre.
